64631.name: Aimed Shot
64631.text: Deal 3 damage. Your next Hero Power deals 2 more damage.

64368.name: Alliance Bannerman
64368.text: Battlecry: Draw a minion. Give minions in your hand +1/+1.
64368.flavorText: Back in my day, we had to carry our inspiration uphill both ways to war.

65676.name: Amulet of Undying
65676.flavorText: Didn't seem to work out too well for this guy.

64903.name: Anetheron
64903.text: Costs (1) if your hand is full.
64903.flavorText: Leads every demonic invasion. Hopefully this one turns out better than the World Tree.

65684.name: Arcane Overflow
65684.text: Deal 8 damage to an enemy minion. Summon a Remnant with stats equal to the excess damage.
65684.flavorText: On this ship, when you can’t use an int, learn how to float.

64487.name: Auctioneer Jaxon
64487.text: Whenever you Trade, Discover a card from your deck to draw instead.
64487.flavorText: "Who's up for a brand-new wisp? This thing's in perfect condition, folks! Never been played..."

64214.name: Auctionhouse Gavel
64214.text: After your hero attacks, reduce the Cost of a Battlecry minion in your hand by (1).
64214.flavorText: "I want to be a judge! Or an auctioneer! Look, all I want is one of those sweet, tiny hammers."

64711.name: Battleground Battlemaster
64711.flavorText: Farm! No wait… Mine! No wait… 3 to Smith—they're taking Farm. Get there now!

64292.name: Best in Shell
64292.flavorText: The agility course takes a while.

64197.name: Blacksmithing Hammer
64197.flavorText: Passed through the hands of countless smiths, and eventually the skulls of their enemies.

65597.name: Blackwater Cutlass
65597.text: Tradeable After you Trade this, reduce the Cost of a spell in your hand by (1).
65597.flavorText: Popular around Stormwind for slashing prices.

64661.name: Blessed Goods
64661.flavorText: Guaranteed to contain no haunted dolls, cursed rings, or corrupted runeblades, or your money back.

64893.name: Bloodbound Imp
64893.text: Whenever this attacks, deal 2 damage to your hero.
64893.flavorText: ALWAYS read the terms and conditions.

64774.name: Bolner Hammerbeak
64774.text: After you play a Battlecry minion, repeat the first Battlecry played this turn.
64774.flavorText: Show him how to do something once, and he can do it a thousand times. This turn.

65619.name: Brilliant Macaw
65619.flavorText: He's been repeating the same shanty for a month. Four pirates walked the plank last week. Middle of the ocean, just walked right off.

64390.name: Call of the Grave
64390.text: Discover a Deathrattle minion. If you have enough Mana to play it, trigger its Deathrattle.
64390.flavorText: Necromancy is motivational speaking for the dead.

64321.name: Canal Slogger
64321.flavorText: "Another Monday in the canals huh? What a slog."

64278.name: Cargo Guard
64278.text: At the end of your turn, gain 3 Armor.

64371.name: Catacomb Guard
64371.text: Lifesteal Battlecry: Deal damage equal to this minion's Attack to an enemy minion.
64371.flavorText: A little dark down here. So much for "serving the Light."

63673.name: Celestial Ink Set
63673.text: After you spend 5 Mana on spells, reduce the Cost of a spell in your hand by (5). Lose 1 Durability.
63673.flavorText: "Dear Mother, I have a lot of spells and burst in my hand. You should maybe run more armor and healing next time. Cordially, Your child"

64665.name: Chaos Leech
64665.text: Lifesteal. Deal 3 damage to a minion. Outcast: Deal 5 instead.

64356.name: Charged Call
64356.text: Discover a -Cost minion and summon it. (Upgraded for each Overload card you played this game!)
64356.flavorText: You have a collect call from "AL'AKIR, LORD OF AIR AND THE FOUR WINDS." Do you accept these charges?

64721.name: Cheesemonger
64721.text: Whenever your opponent casts a spell, add a random spell with the same Cost to your hand.
64721.flavorText: Secretly, the Big Cheese of SI:7.

64724.name: City Architect
64724.flavorText: "Oh, wait, I had this turned the wrong way. This was supposed to be a tower."

64523.name: City Tax
64523.text: Tradeable Lifesteal. Deal 1 damage to all enemy minions.
64523.flavorText: "Look pal, I don't care what kind of legion you saved the world from, pay up or else."

64433.name: Clumsy Courier
64433.text: Battlecry: Cast the highest Cost spell from your hand.

64322.name: Command the Elements
64322.text: Questline: Play 3 cards with Overload. Reward: Unlock your Overloaded Mana Crystals.
64322.flavorText: What, you expected a shaman to have trouble with a place called STORMWIND?

64385.name: Composting
64385.text: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Draw a card."
64385.flavorText: The Treants really give their bodies to the cause.

65700.name: Cookie the Cook
65700.flavorText: Unsurprisingly, "Seafood Surprise" was no one's favorite dish.

65678.name: Copycat
65678.text: Battlecry: Add a copy of the next card your opponent plays to your hand.
65678.flavorText: Whatever you do, DON’T let two of them meet.

64728.name: Cornelius Roame
64728.text: At the start and end of each player's turn, draw a card.
64728.flavorText: Raised two perfectly normal daughters. Then one died and brought doom to Stormwind.

64013.name: Counterfeit Blade
64013.text: Battlecry: Get a copy of a random friendly Deathrattle minion that died this game.
64013.flavorText: Don't worry, the blade retracts into the handle!

64196.name: Cowardly Grunt
64196.text: Deathrattle: Summon a minion from your deck.
64196.flavorText: Cowardice is the wisest part of valor.

65609.name: Crow's Nest Lookout
65609.text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to the left and right-most enemy minions.
65609.flavorText: The extra eyes means he sees extra good.

64894.name: Dark Alley Pact
64894.text: Summon a Fiend with Taunt and stats equal to your hand size.
64894.flavorText: "With your help, I can finally install some proper lighting in this alley."

64443.name: Darkbishop Benedictus
64443.text: Start of Game: If the spells in your deck are all Shadow, enter Shadowform.
64443.flavorText: Dark Bishop takes Light Pawn, check.

65683.name: Deepwater Evoker
65683.text: Battlecry: Draw a spell. Gain Armor equal to its Cost.
65683.flavorText: "Cap'n! We've hit an iceberg! ...No, it’s not my fault!"

64637.name: Defend the Dwarven District
64637.text: Questline: Deal damage with 3 spells. Reward: Your Hero Power can target minions.
64637.flavorText: Don't shoot until you see the purples of their eyes.

65601.name: Defias Blastfisher
65601.text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to a random enemy. Repeat for each of your Beasts.

65692.name: Defias Cannoneer
65692.text: After your hero attacks, deal 2 damage to a random enemy twice.

65677.name: Defias Leper
65677.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Shadow spell, deal 2 damage.
65677.flavorText: Do NOT eat Cookie’s Seafood Surprise.

64897.name: Demonic Assault
64897.text: Deal 3 damage. Summon two 1/3 Voidwalkers with Taunt.
64897.flavorText: Right next to the demonic pepper.

65044.name: Devouring Swarm
65044.text: Choose an enemy minion. Your minions attack it, then return any that die to your hand.

65603.name: Doggie Biscuit
65603.text: Tradeable Give a minion +2/+3. After you Trade this, give a friendly minion Rush.

64896.name: Dreaded Mount
64896.text: Give a minion +1/+1. When it dies, summon an endless Dreadsteed.
64896.flavorText: This is the summoning that never ends, and it goes on and on my friends...

65580.name: Druid of the Reef
65580.text: Choose One - Transform into a 3/1 Shark with Rush; or a 1/3 Turtle with Taunt.
65580.flavorText: “Wow, there’s a whole sunken city down here!”

65645.name: Edwin, Defias Kingpin
65645.text: Battlecry: Draw a card. If you play it this turn, gain +2/+2 and repeat this effect.
65645.flavorText: He’s not going to tear down the walls of Stormwind sitting around in the Hall of Fame.

64416.name: Elekk Mount
64416.text: Give a minion +4/+7 and Taunt. When it dies, summon an Elekk.

64723.name: Elwynn Boar
64723.text: Deathrattle: If you had 7 Elwynn Boars die this game, equip a 15/3 Sword of a Thousand Truths. ( /7)
64723.flavorText: Be grateful we lowered the requirement from 65,340,285.

64008.name: Encumbered Pack Mule
64008.text: Taunt When you draw this, add a copy of it to your hand.
64008.flavorText: "Now I can pick up EVERY knick-knack."

64717.name: Enthusiastic Banker
64717.text: At the end of your turn, store a card from your deck. Deathrattle: Add the stored cards to your hand.

64898.name: Entitled Customer
64898.text: Battlecry: Deal damage equal to your hand size to all other minions.
64898.flavorText: "Do you have any idea how much mana I've spent at your store? 6."

63821.name: Entrapped Sorceress
63821.text: Battlecry: If you control a Quest, Discover a spell.
63821.flavorText: "If you're a city guard, you have to tell me. Otherwise, it's entrapment."

64393.name: Fel Barrage
64393.text: Deal 2 damage to the lowest Health enemy, twice.
64393.flavorText: Kurtrus leapt over a tombstone towards the demonic invaders, yelling "PEW! PEW!" as he shot them down with fel magic.

64396.name: Felgorger
64396.text: Battlecry: Draw a Fel spell. Reduce its Cost by (2).

64375.name: Final Showdown
64375.text: Questline: Draw 4 cards in one turn. Reward: Reduce the Cost of the cards drawn by (1).

64678.name: Find the Imposter
64678.text: Questline: Play 2 SI:7 cards. Reward: Add a Spy Gizmo to your hand.
64678.flavorText: My money is on the evil advisor to the king.

64423.name: Fire Sale
64423.flavorText: Everything is 50% off now that our warehouse burned down.

64007.name: First Blade of Wrynn
64007.text: Divine Shield Battlecry: Gain Rush if this has at least 4 Attack.

64430.name: First Flame
64430.text: Deal 2 damage to a minion. Add a Second Flame to your hand.
64430.flavorText: You never forget your first love: fire.

64727.name: Flightmaster Dungar
64727.text: Battlecry: Choose a flightpath and go Dormant. Awaken with a bonus when you complete it!
64727.flavorText: Flight’s a little bumpy, but there’s plenty of legroom.

64708.name: Florist
64708.text: At the end of your turn, reduce the Cost of a Nature spell in your hand by (1).
64708.flavorText: Trade district. Trade district a shop. Color Legendary. Color Legendary golden. Rose is a rose is a rose is a rose.

64014.name: Garrote
64014.text: Deal 2 damage to the enemy hero. Shuffle 3 Bleeds into your deck that deal 2 more when drawn.
64014.flavorText: "I don't have money… but what I do have is a particular set of skills."

65702.name: Golakka Glutton
65702.flavorText: We lost our last cook to one of these.

64710.name: Goldshire Gnoll
64710.text: Rush Costs (1) less for each other card in your hand.
64710.flavorText: They're searching for one ring. They're pretty sure someone said Goldshire.

65705.name: Goliath, Sneed's Masterpiece
65705.text: Battlecry: Fire five rockets at enemy minions that deal 2 damage each. (You pick the targets!)
65705.flavorText: “Listen, this baby has blades, rockets, and rocket blades. Only thing it doesn’t have is good gas mileage.”

64438.name: Grand Magus Antonidas
64438.text: Battlecry: If you've cast a Fire spell on each of your last three turns, cast 3 Fireballs at random enemies. ( /3)
64438.flavorText: He's really disappointed Jaina became a frost mage.

64320.name: Granite Forgeborn
64320.text: Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of Elementals in your hand and deck by (1).
64320.flavorText: If he stops being useful, just turn him into a kitchen countertop.

65682.name: Grey Sage Parrot
65682.text: Battlecry: Repeat the last spell you've cast that costs (6) or more.
65682.flavorText: Nothing is more terrifying than a parrot squawking "Pyroblast!"

64709.name: Guild Trader
64709.flavorText: Somehow, she manages six different professions.

64277.name: Harbor Scamp
64277.flavorText: Hey, that gnome looks awfully fishy…

65656.name: Heavy Plate
65656.flavorText: "You asked for unbendable, unwavering armor–I don't see why you're upset."

64546.name: Highlord Fordragon
64546.text: Divine Shield After a friendly minion loses Divine Shield, give a minion in your hand +5/+5.
64546.flavorText: "Through my faith and my courage, I shall be protected. And through my honor and sacrifice, another will rise in my place."

65140.name: Hot Streak
65140.text: Your next Fire spell this turn costs (2) less.
65140.flavorText: It's easy to catch fire when you're on fire.

65606.name: Hullbreaker
65606.text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Draw a spell. Your hero takes damage equal to its Cost.
65606.flavorText: Breaks through the hard shell to reach the ship's gooey interior.

64434.name: Ignite
64434.text: Deal damage. Shuffle an Ignite into your deck that deals one more damage.
64434.flavorText: "So there I was in the Deadmines, I had VanCleef by the throat, and I was just about to let him have it when... <sniff> What's that smell?"

65159.name: Imported Tarantula
65159.flavorText: Which forbidden forest did you get this from?

66288.name: Investment Opportunity
66288.flavorText: "It's a real fixer-upper. I mean a REAL fixer upper."

64373.name: Irebound Brute
64373.text: Taunt Costs (1) less for each card drawn this turn.
64373.flavorText: "You don't understand… ogres are an untapped market for vengeance and hatred!"

64397.name: Jace Darkweaver
64397.text: Battlecry: Cast all Fel spells you've played this game (targets enemies if possible).
64397.flavorText: As a former mage, making the transition from fire to felfire was quite easy.

65584.name: Jerry Rig Carpenter
65584.text: Battlecry: Draw a Choose One spell and split it.

64346.name: Kodo Mount
64346.text: Give a minion +4/+2 and Rush. When it dies, summon a Kodo.
64346.flavorText: No matter how big they are or how many times you tell them no, they STILL won't stay off the couch.

64726.name: Lady Prestor
64726.text: Battlecry: Transform minions in your deck into random Dragons. (They keep their original stats and Cost.)
64726.flavorText: To her credit, the best bodyguard for the king WOULD be a dragon in disguise.

64964.name: Leatherworking Kit
64964.text: After three friendly Beasts die, draw a Beast and give it +1/+1. Lose 1 Durability.

64367.name: Lightbringer's Hammer
64367.flavorText: This entire city must be purged. Or at least just the minions.

64688.name: Lion's Frenzy
64688.text: Has Attack equal to the number of cards you've drawn this turn.
64688.flavorText: Only as sharp as your draw.

64719.name: Lion's Guard
64719.text: Battlecry: If you have 15 or less Health, gain +2/+4 and Taunt.
64719.flavorText: She takes the lion's share of the credit, too.

64363.name: Loan Shark
64363.text: Battlecry: Give your opponent a Coin. Deathrattle: You get two.
64363.flavorText: Pay up or you'll be swimming with the fishes.

64291.name: Lost in the Park
64291.text: Questline: Gain 4 Attack with your hero. Reward: Gain 5 Armor.
64291.flavorText: Mister, have you seen my Archdruid?

64199.name: Lothar
64199.text: At the end of your turn, attack a random enemy minion. If it dies, gain +3/+3.
64199.flavorText: Has been around since before there were paladins and those newfangled paladin mechs.

65699.name: Maddest Bomber
65699.text: Battlecry: Deal 12 damage randomly split among all other characters.
65699.flavorText: Talk about a name that limits design space.

64673.name: Maestra of the Masquerade
64673.text: You start the game as a different class until you play a Rogue card.
64673.flavorText: She doesn't drop character until after the DVD commentary.

64718.name: Mailbox Dancer
64718.text: Battlecry: Add a Coin to your hand. Deathrattle: Give your opponent one.
64718.flavorText: He is the reason why we have 7 mailboxes in this district.

65691.name: Man the Cannons
65691.text: Deal 3 damage to a minion and 1 damage to all other minions.
65691.flavorText: Now THAT’S a lotta splash damage!

64629.name: Metamorfin
64629.text: Taunt Battlecry: If you've cast a Fel spell this turn, gain +2/+2.
64629.flavorText: Always wanted to be the green ranger.

64716.name: Mo'arg Forgefiend
64716.flavorText: Enraged not by fel energies, but by an itchy nose he cannot scratch.

65602.name: Monstrous Parrot
65602.text: Battlecry: Get a copy of the last friendly Deathrattle minion that died.
65602.flavorText: What kind of crackers are you feeding that thing?

65583.name: Moonlit Guidance
65583.text: Discover a copy of a card in your deck. If you play it this turn, draw the original.
65583.flavorText: Guff always makes the best decisions after 2 AM.

65599.name: Mr. Smite
65599.flavorText: “Please, Mr. Smite was my father. Call me Yorik.”

65704.name: Multicaster
65704.text: Battlecry: Draw a card for each different spell school you've cast this game. ( )

65608.name: Need for Greed
65608.text: Tradeable Draw 3 cards. If drawn this turn, this costs (3).
65608.flavorText: Sorry guys, I TOTALLY meant to click greed.

64525.name: Noble Mount
64525.text: G ive a minion +1/+1 and Divine Shield. When it dies, summon a Warhorse.
64525.flavorText: The Horde rued the day that Cariel was allowed to take her pet to work.

64722.name: Nobleman
64722.text: Battlecry: Create a Golden copy of a random card in your hand.

64712.name: Northshire Farmer
64712.text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly Beast. Shuffle three 3/3 copies into your deck.

64201.name: Oracle of Elune
64201.text: After you play a minion that costs (2) or less, summon a copy of it.
64201.flavorText: Even the moon goddess needs to back up her databases.

64773.name: Overdraft
64773.text: Tradeable Unlock your Overloaded Mana Crystals to deal that much damage.
64773.flavorText: Wait. It costs mana to be out of mana?!

64705.name: Package Runner
64705.text: Can only attack if you have at least 8 cards in hand.
64705.flavorText: He could go... all... the... way!

64713.name: Pandaren Importer
64713.text: Battlecry: Discover a spell that didn't start in your deck.
64713.flavorText: She carries everything you didn't want and more!

64337.name: Park Panther
64337.text: Rush. Whenever this attacks, give your hero +3 Attack this turn.
64337.flavorText: Somebody called animal control once. It didn't work out very well for anybody.

65598.name: Parrrley
65598.text: Swap this for a card in your opponent's deck.
65598.flavorText: Time to engage in some unfriendly negotiations.

64372.name: Peasant
64372.text: At the start of your turn, draw a card.
64372.flavorText: Better pay them, or they'll join the Defias.

64395.name: Persistent Peddler
64395.text: Tradeable Deathrattle: Summon a Persistent Peddler from your deck.
64395.flavorText: Loves pyramid schemes and bike rides.

64436.name: Prestor's Pyromancer
64436.text: Battlecry: Your next Fire spell has Spell Damage +2.
64436.flavorText: Ah, yeah. This guy. Definitely not an evil dragon in disguise either.

64554.name: Prismatic Jewel Kit
64554.text: After a friendly minion loses Divine Shield, give minions in your hand +1/+1. Lose 1 Durability.
64554.flavorText: The divine trick to jewelcrafting is tumbling your own rocks.

65610.name: Proving Grounds
65610.text: Summon two minions from your deck. They fight!
65610.flavorText: 1v1 me on Proving Grounds, DH only, no items, 4 stocks.

64198.name: Provoke
64198.text: Tradeable Choose a friendly minion. Enemy minions attack it.
64198.flavorText: "Heh, Greetings. Heh, Greetings. Heh, Greetings. I will crush you!"

64425.name: Psyfiend
64425.text: After you cast a Shadow spell, deal 2 damage to each hero.
64425.flavorText: Listens to a LOT of K-pop.

64280.name: Raid the Docks
64280.flavorText: Winning the annual Ratchet Regatta really went to their heads.

64965.name: Ramming Mount
64965.text: Give a minion +2/+2 and Immune while attacking. When it dies, summon a Ram.
64965.flavorText: Tavish has some road rage issues to work through.

64627.name: Rats of Extraordinary Size
64627.text: Summon seven 1/1 Rats. Any that can't fit on the battlefield go to your hand with +4/+4.
64627.flavorText: They don't care if you believe they exist.

65693.name: Remote-Controlled Golem
65693.text: After this takes damage, shuffle two Golem Parts into your deck. When drawn, summon a 2/1 Mech.
65693.flavorText: Someone got a little too excited inventing a can opener.

65591.name: Righteous Defense
65591.text: Set a minion's Attack and Health to 1. Give the stats it lost to a minion in your hand.
65591.flavorText: Paladins... Always stealing someone else’s thunder. And stats.

64308.name: Rise to the Occasion
64308.text: Questline: Play 3 different 1-Cost cards. Reward: Equip a 1/4 Light's Justice.
64308.flavorText: Faith is never lost, only repurposed.

64960.name: Rodent Nest
64960.flavorText: Pig sty? No, this is a rat's nest.

64714.name: Royal Librarian
64714.flavorText: Books on how to flip the Auction House are down that way.

63677.name: Runed Mithril Rod
63677.text: After you draw 4 cards, reduce the Cost of cards in your hand by (1). Lose 1 Durability.
63677.flavorText: "Please, I need these greens to disenchant them." —Every Enchanter Ever

64163.name: SI:7 Assassin
64163.text: Costs (1) less for each SI:7 card you've played this game. Combo: Destroy an enemy minion.
64163.flavorText: You can't keep the streets clean if you're afraid to get your hands dirty.

64033.name: SI:7 Extortion
64033.text: Tradeable Deal 3 damage to an undamaged character.
64033.flavorText: "It's a dangerous world out there. It'd be a shame if your protection insurance were to suddenly run out…"

64031.name: SI:7 Informant
64031.text: Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each other SI:7 card you've played this game.
64031.flavorText: Sitting in a tavern all day and looking scary is hard work, but somebody has to do it.

64034.name: SI:7 Operative
64034.text: Rush After this attacks a minion, gain Stealth.
64034.flavorText: What do you mean you're out of ponies?

64166.name: SI:7 Skulker
64166.text: Stealth Battlecry: The next card you draw costs (1) less.
64166.flavorText: Burying bones and calling it skullduggery.

64435.name: Sanctum Chandler
64435.text: After you cast a Fire spell, draw a spell.
64435.flavorText: Has been burning at both ends to keep the place illuminated.

64349.name: Seek Guidance
64349.text: Questline: Play a 2, 3, and 4-Cost card. Reward: Discover a card from your deck.
64349.flavorText: Xyrella was looking for spiritual guidance but found deck-building tips instead.

65604.name: Shadowblade Slinger
65604.text: Battlecry: If you've taken damage this turn, deal that much to an enemy minion.
65604.flavorText: Throwing knives isn’t easy for a warlock. It’s quite painful, in fact.

63732.name: Shadowcloth Needle
63732.text: After you cast a Shadow spell, deal 1 damage to all enemies. Lose 1 Durability.
63732.flavorText: Makes light of the darkest repair jobs.

64895.name: Shady Bartender
64895.flavorText: One sin and tonic, coming right up.

64391.name: Shard of the Naaru
64391.flavorText: Fell from the sky, huh? I'll give you ten gold.

64439.name: Sheldras Moontree
64439.text: Battlecry: The next 3 spells you draw are Cast When Drawn.
64439.flavorText: Sheldras really went to the park for his pilgrimage.

64279.name: Shiver Their Timbers!
64279.text: Deal 2 damage to a minion. If you control a Pirate, deal 5 instead.
64279.flavorText: Who knew there was overlap between pirates and lumberjacks?

64394.name: Sigil of Alacrity
64394.text: At the start of your next turn, draw a card and reduce its Cost by (1).
64394.flavorText: Red means stop. Purple means GO REALLY FAST.

63955.name: Sketchy Information
63955.text: Draw a Deathrattle card that costs (4) or less. Trigger its Deathrattle.
63955.flavorText: "I trust the Forsaken as far as I can smell them. Which, I guess is actually pretty far."

64488.name: Sorcerer's Gambit
64488.text: Questline: Cast a Fire, Frost, and Arcane spell. Reward: Draw a spell.
64488.flavorText: After "the incident," the Stockades really had to reevaluate their anti-mage protocols.

64236.name: Sow the Soil
64236.text: Choose One - Give your minions +1 Attack; or Summon a 2/2 Treant.

64704.name: Spice Bread Baker
64704.text: Battlecry: Restore Health to your hero equal to your hand size.
64704.flavorText: The secret ingredient is love. And a LOT of butter.

64215.name: Spirit Alpha
64215.text: After you play a card with Overload, summon a 2/3 Spirit Wolf with Taunt.
64215.flavorText: Just like in the natural world, the alpha of the species is bright purple.

64715.name: Stockades Guard
64715.flavorText: "You there! Defend this prison with your life. It's my break."

64725.name: Stockades Prisoner
64725.text: Starts Dormant. After you play 3 cards, this awakens.
64725.flavorText: She was arrested for lockpicking. Her imprisonment was not well thought out.

64975.name: Stormwind Freebooter
64975.text: Battlecry: Give your hero +2 Attack this turn.
64975.flavorText: "Just don't stab the ankles! I want his boots!"

64968.name: Stormwind Piper
64968.text: After this minion attacks, give your Beasts +1/+1.
64968.flavorText: Throws crazy parties with the Rat King—except when it's raining.

63712.name: Stubborn Suspect
63712.flavorText: He keeps saying "I'll never talk," but no one has actually asked him anything.

65655.name: Suckerhook
65655.text: At the end of your turn, transform your weapon into one that costs (1) more.
65655.flavorText: A moderately better dining companion than Suckerbeard.

65590.name: Sunwing Squawker
65590.text: Battlecry: Repeat the last spell you've cast on a friendly minion on this.
65590.flavorText: Most parrots repeat curses, not blessings.

64900.name: The Demon Seed
64900.text: Questline: Take 10 damage on your turns. Reward: Lifesteal. Deal 3 damage to the enemy hero.
64900.flavorText: Just need some elbow grease to get this working. Oh, and your soul.

64970.name: The Rat King
64970.text: Rush. Deathrattle: Go Dormant. Revive after 5 friendly minions die.
64970.flavorText: "I'm the giant rat that makes all of da rules!"

64355.name: Tiny Toys
64355.text: Summon four random 5-Cost minions. Make them 2/2.

64899.name: Touch of the Nathrezim
64899.text: Deal 2 damage to a minion. If it dies, restore 3 Health to your hero.
64899.flavorText: "You're giving your soul to me? I'm touched."

64010.name: Traveling Merchant
64010.text: Tradeable Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each other friendly minion you control.

64419.name: Twilight Deceptor
64419.text: Battlecry: If any hero took damage this turn, draw a Shadow spell.
64419.flavorText: Nobody asks questions if you're carrying a clipboard.

64357.name: Two-Faced Investor
64357.text: At the end of your turn, reduce the Cost of a card in your hand by (1). (50% chance to increase.)
64357.flavorText: Should never have opened that joint account...

64729.name: Varian, King of Stormwind
64729.text: Battlecry: Draw a Rush minion to gain Rush. Repeat for Taunt and Divine Shield.
64729.flavorText: Man, this guy is so cool. Sure hope nothing happens to him.

64388.name: Vibrant Squirrel
64388.text: Deathrattle: Shuffle 4 Acorns into your deck. When drawn, summon a 2/1 Squirrel.
64388.flavorText: Oh, they're cute now. Just wait till they unleash a Savage Roar.

64429.name: Voidtouched Attendant
64429.text: Both heroes take one extra damage from all sources.
64429.flavorText: Don't TOUCH the Void. You don't know where it's been.

65579.name: Wealth Redistributor
65579.text: Taunt. Battlecry: Swap the Attack of the highest and lowest Attack minion.
65579.flavorText: WOULD YE LIKE CASH BACK? [ ] YAR HAR [ ] YO HO

64384.name: Wickerclaw
64384.text: After your hero gains Attack, this minion gains +2 Attack.
64384.flavorText: They say pets tend to look like their owners.
